CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

1. DCB: This is a material name, specifically a type of solvent (dichlorobenzene).
2. TCB: This is also a material name, specifically a type of solvent (trichlorobenzene).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

1. Solvent: This is a substance used to dissolve or suspend other substances. In this context, it is the medium in which the photovoltaic cells are suspended or dissolved.
2. DCB: This is an abbreviation for a specific solvent.
3. TCB: This is an abbreviation for a different solvent.

Therefore, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are DCB and TCB, which are the specific solvents mentioned.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The relevant entity that clearly refers to a material property in the paragraph is:

1. Solvent: This is a material that can be changed from DCB to TCB, and its change affects the photovoltaic performance.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Solvent (when changed from DCB to TCB) |

In the paragraph, the solvent is the material whose change from DCB to TCB affects the photovoltaic performance. Therefore, the solvent is the only valid entity that refers to a material property in the paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

1. Solvent: This is a substance used to dissolve or suspend other substances. In this context, it is the property being changed from DCB (dichlorobenzene) to TCB (trichlorobenzene).
2. Performance: This refers to the ability of the photovoltaic system to convert sunlight into electricity. It is the property that is being improved when the solvent is changed.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. Performance: This refers to the ability of the photovoltaic system to convert sunlight into electricity. It is the material property that is being improved when the solvent is changed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| The ability of the photovoltaic system to convert sunlight into electricity (performance) |
| Dichlorobenzene (solvent before change) |
| Trichlorobenzene (solvent after change) |
